scripts.docs:compile_re_doc: yarn openapi-generator-cli validate -i website/static/openapi.json && npx @redocly/cli build-docs website/static/openapi.json -o website/static/api-docs.html
scripts.docs:build: yarn docs:compile_re_doc && cd website && yarn build
scripts.gen:openapi-spec: docker compose run -u root -w /home/decidim/module --rm rest_full bin/swaggerize -o website/static/openapi.json
scripts.format: docker compose run -u root -w /home/decidim/module --rm rest_full bundle exec rubocop -A .
scripts.postcommit: yarn format && yarn gen:node-client && yarn docs:compile_re_doc
